Package de.hu.gralog.beans.support

This package defines classes that are especially useful to define Structure-Beans in GrALoG.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
StructureBean<V,E,GB extends StructureBean,G extends ListenableGraph<V,E>> This interface should be implemented by Structure-Beans in order to get access to the Structure-instance they belong to.
 

Class Summary
DefaultPropertyAndDisplayChangeListenableBean<V,E> This class is a helper class to implement the PropertyChangeListenable and DisplayChangeListenable interface.
DefaultPropertyChangeListenableBean This class is a helper class to implement the PropertyChangeListenable interface.
 

Package de.hu.gralog.beans.support Description

This package defines classes that are especially useful to define Structure-Beans in GrALoG. To define a Structure-Bean in GrALoG you should subclass one of DefaultPropertyChangeListenableBean respectively DefaultPropertyAndDisplayChangeListenableBean depending on whether or not you want to fire DisplayChangeEvents. The interface StructureBean gives your bean access to the Structure-instance it belongs to.

Plugin-Developers

Please refer to the description of StructureBeanFactory if you want to implement your own Structure-Bean for GrALoG.
